title: RZ PowerPoint Converter Platinum v3.21
description:
RZ PowerPoint Converter Platinum v3.2.1


Developer	: RealZeal Soft http://www.freepowerpointtovideo.com/
License/Price	: $ 49.95 USD
Size / OS	: Win XP/XP 64 bit/Vista/Vista 64 bit/7/7 64 bit/8/8 64 bit
Last Updated	: IDK
Demo Limit	: Some functions are disabled

Description / Main Features: 

Support all PowerPoint versions as input

Convert PowerPoint 2013, 2010, 2007, 2003, 2002, 2000 files, help the Microsoft Office PowerPoint user to create more video or dvd copies of their PowerPoint presentations.

Support all PowerPoint file formats, like .ppt, .pptx, .pptm, .pps, .ppsx, .pot, .potx, .potm.

Convert PowerPoint presentation to video of any formats, such as AVI, MP4, MOV, WMV, ASF, MPEG1/MPEG2, FLV, 3GP, OGG and HD videos of excellent quality.

Convert PowerPoint presentations to videos for share on blogs, social or video sharing websites like YouTube, Facebook, Hulu, etc.

Convert PowerPoint presentations to videos for playback on portable devices, like iPod, iPad/iPad2/iPad3/iPad4, iPad Air, iPad Mini/iPad Mini2, iPhone, Pocket PC, PSP, Zune, etc.

Convert PowerPoint presentations to HD videos for playback on HD player, like Apple TV, Big Screen LCD/LED TV, etc.

Convert PowerPoint presentations to DVD movie and burn to any DVD disc for playback on home DVD players.

Convert and burn many PowerPoint presentations onto one DVD for playback on home DVD players.

Convert PowerPoint presentations with all animations.

Built-in the powerful dvd menu editor, easy to add/design dynamic DVD Title and Chapter Menu(main menu and sub menu) onto the DVD, customize anything on DVD menu.

Support NTSC and PAL DVD.

Support 16:9 or 4:3 DVD, faultlessly resize video(Keep aspect ratio or Stretch to fit).

According to the different usage of the output videos, you can adjust the video settings such as video resolution, video frame rate and video bitrate, etc. to make them play in higher quality.

High Performance and High Quality Video/Audio processor Engine, offer the best video/audio quality.

Built-in the high compatibility DVD burner(Compliant with all popular burner drives, supports all DVD Writable disc, include DVD-R, DVD-RW, DVD+R, DVD+RW, DVD+R DL, DVD-R DL, etc. 



The difference between Free version, Video Pro version, DVD Pro version and Platinum version: <a href="
